metadata.Title: CVE-2020-8618 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
An attacker who is permitted to send zone data to a server via zonetransfer can exploit this to intentionally trigger the assertion failurewith a specially constructed zone, denying service to clients.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-8618` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
bind9-host - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
bind9-libs - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
bind9-utils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
bind9utils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
dnsutils - 1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.16.1-0ubuntu2.2').
